name: Firefox - Glass Menus
description: Changes the background of the Firefox menus to Aero transparency. Designed for visibility on both light and dark backgrounds.

user.name: pkchris
user.about: I spend most of my time playing video games, hanging out with friends, going to school and working. I do computer repair and web design work and I'm currently taking computer programming in college.

additional_info: The right-click menus pop up in their default location (won't pop up underneath or away from your mouse) and all menu items including disabled items have a white glow for all-around visibility. Looks best if you use a Windows theme with sharp corners otherwise the menu shadow will leave white space. The best custom Windows themes can be found at - http://browse.deviantart.com/customization/skins/windows7/visualstyle/
